meta.title: Aquadecor - Premium 3D Aquarium Backgrounds
meta.description: Transform your aquarium with the most realistic 3D backgrounds and decorations. Handcrafted in Europe for 20+ years.

hero.headline: The Most Realistic 3D Aquarium Backgrounds
hero.subheadline: Handcrafted perfection that transforms your aquarium into a living masterpiece

tagline.headline: Only Nature Can Copy Us
tagline.subheadline: Handcrafted 3D backgrounds so realistic, even nature takes notes.

features.headline: Built to Last Forever
features.description: Obsessively hyper-realistic replicas, made from polyurethane/resin blends. Non-toxic, temperature-resistant, and come with 20-year or lifetime warranties.

social.headline: Trusted for 20+ years by 200K+ Tankheads
social.subheadline: Real-as-rain setups from aquarium enthusiasts worldwide.

comparison.headline: Whatever you choose, you won't regret it!
comparison.subheadline: Standard dimensions for quick setup, or custom-made to fit your exact vision.

calculator.headline: Design Your Perfect Background in 3D
calculator.description: Our interactive 3D calculator lets you visualize and customize every detail before ordering.
